name: Space Route X7
description: Beyond the known universe our hero pilot wakes up behind the ship control board. One cuddling voice speaks to him to get ready as they are entering asteroid field. Hero pilot wakes up and immediately starts to control ship and shoot those asteroid obstacles. As they travel further they encounter pirate ships, mercenary ships, just ships, drones, floating asteroid rocket launchers...and they all leave some coins after explosion...interesting :) Take control of the ship and go where you have not go before...but now you can...and do some space shooting along the way.
